SELECT PJT, HNO, CASE WHEN SNM = 'SD' THEN '' ELSE SNM END SNM, BJD, HDM, UPD, NAP, ZSITE_NM, ADDR1 || ' ' || ADDR2 || '(' || ZSITE_TEL || ')' AS ADDR, (SELECT NAMET FROM SAPHEE.ZPST0011 WHERE MANDT=C.MANDT AND TEMNO=C.TEMNO AND RETIF = '') NAMET, (SELECT NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.ZMMT012 WHERE MANDT=C.MANDT AND LIFNR=C.LIFNR) NAME1, VALUE((SELECT X3.NAME1 FROM SAPHEE.VBAK AS X1 INNER JOIN SAPHEE.VBPA AS X2 ON X1.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X1.VBELN = X2.VBELN INNER JOIN SAPHEE.KNA1 AS X3 ON X3.MANDT = X2.MANDT AND X3.KUNNR = X2.KUNNR WHERE X1.MANDT = C.MANDT AND X1.ZZPJT_ID = C.POSID AND X2.PARVW = 'Z3'), '') AS NAME,
ZSPEC1,
REQ,
(CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SAPHEE.ZCMFL001 AS X WHERE X.MANDT = C.MANDT AND X.GBN = 'K' AND X.PSPID = C.POSID AND X.POSID = C.POSID_1) > 0 THEN '∆ƒ¿œ√∑∫Œ' ELSE '' END ) AS FILE
FROM SAPHEE.ZPST11076M AS A ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER01 AS B ,SAPHEE.ZMASTER02 AS C
WHERE A.MANDT = B.MANDT AND A.PJT = B.POSID AND A.MANDT = C.MANDT AND A.PJT = C.POSID AND A.HNO = RIGHT(C.POSID_1,3) AND A.MANDT = #G_MANDT# AND A.PJT = #PJT# AND A.HNO = #HNO#
FOR FETCH ONLY WITH UR
